text:
Hey folks,

I am new to HS CMS and taking a CMS certification. I am following this doc and I am stuck with `hs fetch`
I ran `hs fetch --account=FirstTheme src FirstTheme` and here is an error `[ERROR] The request failed because "src" was not found in account NUMBER. Asset not found at path 'src'`
My HubSpot.config.yml
```defaultPortal: FirstTheme
portals:
  - name: FirstTheme```

Hey <@U031M9N4XCJ>! What’s the name of the folder you’re trying to fetch in the Design Manager? The order of that command is `hs fetch --account=XXXX {{file name in DM}} {{file name local}}`, and I usually encountered issues when I have the order swapped.
Thank you! This's very helpful. I can fetched it after I uploaded the project folder into DM. I think it skipped this step in the doc.
